headline.main: DEAL TO END BOMBING OF BERLIN SUGGESTED; Writer Says Nazis May Be Induced Not to Use 'Secret'

lead_paragraph: MADRID, Dec. 1 (AP) -- A suggestion that Germany may forego the use of her "secret weapon" if the Allies stop bombing cities was published today by the newspaper Madrid in a dispatch from its Berlin correspondent.
abstract: Madrid newspaper Berlin correspondent hints Ger may withhold secret weapon use if Allies will limit cities bombing
snippet: MADRID, Dec. 1 (AP) -- A suggestion that Germany may forego the use of her "secret weapon" if the Allies stop bombing cities was published today by the newspaper Madrid in a dispatch from its Berlin correspondent....
